channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 02:23 Drive anxiety in the Odesa region. Follow the subsequent messages.
item.description: 🟢 02:23 Drive anxiety in the Odesa region. Follow the subsequent messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
